casebody.data:
ROUSE
v.
FORSYTH COUNTY DSS 1PA19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 10, 2019 Gloria L. Woods, Assistant County Attorney, for Forsyth County Department of Social Services. Benjamin P. Winikoff, Attorney at Law, for Rouse, Teressa B.

Gloria L. Woods, Assistant County Attorney.

M. Travis Payne, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of July 2019 by North Carolina Advocates for Justice for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of July 2019."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
